alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 4:15PM CDT until July 03 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 415 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greenwood, or 10 miles west of Shreveport, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Greenwood and Cross Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
